bibl.title: The Finds of the Papyri: The Archaeology of Papyrology. Translated by Adam BÜLOW-JACOBSEN.
bibl.note: From "Smash-and-Grab" Jobs to Subtle Stratigraphy: The Time of the Consuls; - Sebâkh and Cartonnage: The Papyrological Excavations (The First Fayyum Find; - The Excavations for Papyri; - Sebbâkhîn vs. Archaeologists; - Saving Papyri); - The Scientific Excavations (The Coming of the Archaeologists; - Archaeological Multidisciplinarity as Seen by a Papyrologist). - In What Archaeological Contexts are Papyri Found?: Books in Tombs; - Cartonnage and Crocodiles; - Buildings; - The Document Caches; - The Rubbish Deposits. - Conclusion.
CUVIGNY Hélène, The Finds of the Papyri: The Archaeology of Papyrology. Translated by Adam BÜLOW-JACOBSEN.
R.S. BAGNALL (Ed.), The Oxford Handbook of Papyrology (Oxford, 2009) pp. 30-58, 10 figg.
